meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1029.

td.p: Matt Lindley, a senior from Cleveland Heights, Ohio
Marny Helfrich, a junior from Baltimore, Maryland
Eric Newhouse, a junior from Sioux City, Iowa

tr.td: THE VIKINGS
ART
SICKNESS & HEALTH
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
VERY GRIMM FAIRY TALES
WORDS WITHIN WORDS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The name of this country came from "Rus", a band of Swedish Vikings who settled in Eastern Europe')
